prefixDef.p: Analytical descriptors are considered to represent concepts from the DEPCHA bookkeeping ontology and can be extended to respective URIs.
Analytical descriptors are considered to represent concepts from the project-specific DEPCHA ontology and can be extended to respective URIs.
Analytical descriptors are considered to represent concepts from the historical units and currencies ontology and can be extended to respective URIs.

listPerson.head: Prosopography
listPerson.desc: Personen, welche im Rechnungsbuch BayHStA_KAAA_344_R1458-62 des Klosters Aldersbach, genannt sind.

listPlace.desc: Orte, welche im Rechnungsbuch D-MBayHStA_KAAA_341_R1291-1362 des Klosters Aldersbach genannt sind.

div.head:
Nos frater Fridericus. dictus abbas in Ebera, anno Domini .Mo.CCCo.
.XVIo. proxima dominica Trinitatis, abbaciam in Alderspach fili
am nostram visitantes, submissum invenimus et reliquimus statum domus:
div.ab:
Receperant a visitacione preterita, que facta fuerat, anno Domini
Mo.CCCo.XVo. in die translacionis beati Martini episcopi
usque in presens, quingenta et XXXII. t. d. Rat.
Cuius accepti summam seu numerum expensorum per idem tempus in quatuor
t. et .VI. s. supercrescit. Debita domus ducenta t. d.
Habebant pre manibus panis et vini sufficienciam usque ad nova,
animalia sicut anno preterito. Subscripta autem in accepto et ex
penso acceperant et distribuerant ut inferius est notatum:

t.
